answers.answer: Have you had her tested for diabetes?  She also could be ready for a growth spirt.  My daughter always got chunky before growing taller.

my siblings and I always got chunky before we grew and so do my children.  It's "normal" for them and if that is all that it is than you will know when she starts to bulk up to start saving your money cuz it won't be long before she's too tall for her clothes!! LOL

question: My daughter is going to be 6 years old in Feb 07 and although she had always been lean as toddler, since 4 years old she has become chunkier.  She is actually pretty tall for age.  The clothing that she wears is typically 6x or 7/8.  She is always looking for something to eat.  We watch her closely and try to feed her wisely selecting from an array for fruits and vegetables.  She never drinks sodas.  Her liquids usually consists of milk or water.  She hardly consumes juices.  I don't understand why she doesn't loose weight and why she consistently says she is hungry even after she just ate.  please help me understand
title: always hungry
